title: NASA Shares Hidden Figures Congressional Gold Medal Remarks
summary: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson released his remarks as prepared for Wednesday’s Hidden Figures Congressional Gold Medal ceremony in Washington. title: Giant Leaps Start at Johnson for NASA’s SpaceX Crew-9 Commander Nick Hague
summary: As the hub of human spaceflight, NASA’s Johnson Space Center in Houston holds a variety of unique responsibilities and privileges. Those include being the home of NASA’s astronaut corps. title: NASA, US Department of Education to Launch STEM Project in Washington
summary: Media are invited to the kickoff event of a collaboration between NASA and the U.S. Department of Education at 4 p.m. EDT Monday, Sept. 23, at the Wheatley Education Campus in Washington. The interagency project, 21st Century Community Learning Centers, aims to engage students in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) education during after-school hours. […]
